CHAT.comment: when tape starts, child is already playing with toy car
child opens hood of car and shows mom.
child and mom roll car back and forth.
child puts car on her head, drops it and then gives it to mom.
mom pushes car across the room.
child tries to send car down her legs but it stops when it hits her sandals.
mom sends car under her legs.
mom sends car over her legs.
mom sends car down her legs.
child puts car on her knees and it falls off.
child laughs.
child and mom speak simultaneously.
child tries to send car down her legs and it hits her sandals.
child tries to do it again and the car gets stuck on her sandal.
child tries it one more time and it gets down her leg and flips over.
child unstraps her sandal and then sends the car down her leg.
child takes her sandal strap off.
child tries to send the car down her leg but it still gets stuck.
mom and child laugh.
mom slowly rolls car on the carpet.
child is referring to the computer box and the fish tank.
mom turns to face the table and grabs a chair.
child gets up and walks over towards mirror.
child is referring to light on camera.
camera is following child's face and she is mesmerized by the light.
child returns to mom.
mom is referring to the spoiler on the car.
child is referring to something on the back of the car; maybe the spoiler?
mom points to hood of car.
child drives car around.
INV takes toy car from room
child covers her eyes.
INV gives child meerkat as she uncovers her eyes
mom talks to meerkat.
mom talks for meerkat.
child talks to meerkat.
child talks for meerkat.
mom talks to meerkat.
mom points to computer box and fish tank respectively.
mom covers her eyes and child hides meerkat under the table and then sits next to couch.
mom looks under the couch.
mom talks to meerkat.
child covers her eyes.
mom hides meerkat behind child and she sits next to fish tank.
mom and child laugh.
child lays on couch and covers her eyes and mom tries to hide meerkat next to her but then pulls back.
child rolls over and opens her eyes.
child laughs.
mom hides meerkat under her purse next to child and then stands beside door.
child finds meerkat and pulls it out.
child hides between table and mirror after putting meerkat next to fish tank.
mom talks to meerkat.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child runs over to couch and closes her eyes.
mom hides meerkat under couch and sits at table.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child points to heater.
INV enters.
child looks under couch.
INV takes meerkat from room
INV and child uncover computer box
INV leaves.
mom and child move over to computer box.
child looks behind computer box and then under it.
mom runs her fingers over row of lights and gasps.
child runs her fingers over lights on computer box.
child touches lights in middle and computer box lights up and makes noise.
mom runs fingers over lights in center of computer box.
mom laughs and waves her hand over middle sensor.
child runs fingers over computer box and it makes noise.
mom looks at top sensor.
mom makes the same motion and computer box lights up and makes different noise.
mom and child stay silent for a minute and computer box does not light up or make noise.
child touches computer box and it lights up and makes noise.
mom runs her finger over row of lights on side of computer box.
child touches computer box and it lights up; she covers her mouth and mom laughs.
mom laughs.
child touches top sensor and computer box lights up and makes noise.
child points to microphones on ceiling.
mom and INV speak simultaneously.
INV covers computer box.
child points to fish tank.
INV puts Robodog on floor.
INV leaves room.
child sits on floor to play with robodog.
robodog walks up to child and turns once it runs into her.
mom sits on floor.
child pushes button on robodog's back and it starts to move again.
child pushes button and robodog starts to move.
mom talks to robodog.
child presses button and robodog moves its head.
mom laughs.
mom talks to robodog.
child laughs.
mom points to back and forehead respectively.
robodog wags its tail and moves its head.
mom talks to robodog.
mom laughs as robodog moves.
child picks up robodog.
mom talks to robodog.
child picks robodog up and it starts to move.
mom and child laugh as robodog sits down.
mom talks to robodog as it starts to walk.
mom and child laugh.
child gives robodog to mom and she talks to it.
mom and child laugh as robodog moves in mom's lap.
mom puts robodog on child's lap.
child puts robodog down and crawls away from it as it walks towards her.
mom talks to robodog.
child puts her leg out and robodog walks into it.
robodog stops and looks around and mom and child laugh.
child picks robodog up and moves it over towards mom.
mom talks to robodog.
child presses button on robodog's back and it starts to move again.
child presses the button again and robodog does the same thing.
mom opens and closes her mouth to imitate robodog.
child presses button on forehead and robodog moves its head.
mom pushes button between robodog's shoulders.
child presses something in robodog's ear.
child plays with robodog for a while and mom looks on in silence.
mom and child speak simultaneously as child picks up robodog.
robodog does something out of view of camera.
mom laughs.
child gives robodog to INV.
INV takes robodog from room.
mom laughs.
mom and INV laugh.
INV enters room with degu.
child opens her eyes
mom goes over to sit at table.
INV leaves room.
child talks to degu.
child talks to degu.
child looks up because she hears something outside the room.
mom moves to other side of table and makes clicking noises.
mom and child talk to degu.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
child laughs as degu stands up.
mom sniffs and wrinkles her nose to imitate degu.
mom and child nod their heads.
mom talks to degu.
mom and child make clicking noises at degu.
mom talks to degu.
child points to bottom of cage.
child makes sniffing noise at degu.
mom talks to degu.
mom and child make clicking noises.
mom talks to degu.
child laughs.
child covers her eyes and shakes her head no.
INV leaves with degu.
mom laughs.
INV moves chair out of child's path.
INV and child uncover fish tank
mom moves over to fish tank.
INV leaves room.
mom and child move to one side of tank.
mom and child move to other side of tank.
mom and child move to side of tank.
child points to the ceiling.
child sits down next to mom and they both watch the tank.
mom points to back of tank.
mom and child talk simultaneously.
mom picks child up so she can see above the cage.
INV covers fish tank.
